desc.html: Visualisation of the (countable) field of algebraic numbers in the complex plane. Colours indicate the leading integer coefficient of the polynomial the number is a root of (red = 1 i.e. the algebraic integers, green = 2, blue = 3, yellow = 4...). Points becomes smaller as the other coefficients and number of terms in the polynomial become larger. View shows integers 0,1 and 2 at bottom right, +i near top.

wiki.Credit: I (Stephen J. Brooks (talk)) created this work entirely by myself.
wiki.Artist: Stephen J. Brooks (talk)
